entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is introduced as someone who gives Calming Draughts to students. She bursts into tears during Herbology and sobs about being too stupid for exams.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who receives a Calming Draught from Madam Pomfrey. He feels unhappy without D.A. lessons and enjoys working in the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as someone who will react to the D.A. members receiving 'Outstanding' grades in their Defense Against the Dark Arts O.W.L.s.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey gives a Calming Draught to Harry after he bursts into tears during Herbology.
Harry wonders how Umbridge will react when the D.A. members receive 'Outstanding' grades in their Defense Against the Dark Arts O.W.L.s.
